org.mmbase.module.lucene

Class Searcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mmbase.module.lucene.Searcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, FullIndexEvents.Listener, NewSearcher.Listener

    public class Searcher
extends Object
implements NewSearcher.Listener, FullIndexEvents.Listener
    A wrapper around Lucene's IndexSearcher. Every Indexer has its own Searcher.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Pierre van Rooden
    To Do:
    Should the StopAnalyzers be replaced by index.analyzer? Something else?

      • createQuery

        public static org.apache.lucene.search.Query createQuery(String constraintsText)
        Parses a constraint into a query. Constraints are separated by whitespace and of the format: field:[ EQ | GT | GTE | LT | LTE | NE ]:value[:value]
